menuItemOpenWithProxy.description: Title of the context menu item that allows you to open a url with jsproxy.

menuItemSearchWithProxy.description: Title of the context menu item that allows you to search a keyword with Google.

menuItemOpenImageWithProxy.description: Title of the context menu item that allows you to open an image with jsproxy.

pageAction.description: Title of the page action button that allows you to reopen current page with or without jsproxy.
